Soran`s Warrgle had a tag battle against Cilan`s Pansage and Ash`s Unfezant. The move combinations proved to be effective in the tag battle against Ash and Cilan until they also decided to use their own combination of moves which ended up overpowering Soran`s Warrgle and Riiku`s Mogurew and they lost the tag battle.

character.name: Mogurew (Riiku)
character.description: Riiku`s Mogurew was first seen popping out of the ground in front of Ash and his friends who were on their way to Higaki City where the Isshu League was to be held. Together with its trainer Riiku, the earth warrior Mogurew controls everything on land. During tag battles, Riiku`s Mogurew pairs up with Soran`s Warrgle and they use a combination of moves for their attacks and name them appropriate to what the combination produces. Riiku`s Mogurew had a tag battle against Cilan`s Pansage and Ash`s Unfezant. The move combinations proved to be effective in the tag battle against Ash and Cilan until they also decided to use their own combination of moves which ended up overpowering Soran`s Warrgle and Riiku`s Mogurew and they lost the tag battle.

character.name: Pururill (Musashi)
character.description: Jessie`s Frillish was revealed when it was sent out to battle at Professor Juniper`s laboratory.

character.name: Morobareru (Kojirou)
character.description: James`s Amoonguss was revealed when it was sent out to battle at Professor Juniper`s laboratory.

character.name: Parker
character.description: Parker are the Chief Purser. They help guests in the Decolora Archipelago so they can enjoy their voyage even more.

character.name: Ms Ripple
character.description: Ms Ripple is a wealthy jewel collector who brought along many of her most precious jewels on-board the ship that Ash and his friends were traveling on while in the Decolora Archipelago. A screenshot on the tablet has the romanization of her name as "Lipple" by deciphering the anime language in the window title but it is obvious from the other characters in the episode that her proper name is Ripple as it ties in with Shoal, Tide and Current.

character.name: Choroneko (Ms Ripple)
character.description: Ms Ripple`s Purrloin is a very smart and investigative Pokémon. When Cilan first saw it he was afraid of it as he has issues with Choroneko`s but after helping him with clues to solve the mystery of the stolen Lepardas` Eye, he was more friendly with Ms Ripple`s Purrloin.

character.name: Miruhog (Ms Ripple)
character.description: Ms Ripple`s Watchog was instructed to guard the jewels that were in Ms Ripple quarters. During the finals of the Marine Cup Tournament, the power was disrupted and the lights went out. Ms Ripple`s Watchog was then attacked and the Lepardas` Eye jewel was stolen. None of its attacks are known.

character.name: Shoal
character.description: Shoal is a jewel collector who was very interested in Ms Ripple`s Lepardas` Eye jewel which she had brought with her on the ship while journeying on-board the ship that Ash and his friends were traveling on while in the Decolora Archipelago.

character.name: Roselia (Shoal)
character.description: Shoal`s Roseila was briefly seen in the hallway outside of Ms Ripple`s room on the ship when the power was out. It used Sleep Powder to knock out Ms Ripple`s Watchog who was guarding the room so that Shoal could get another look at the Lepardas` Eye jewel.

character.name: Tide
character.description: Tide is a criminal that tried to steal the Lepardas` Eye jewel from Ms Ripple room on a ship that was traveling in the Decolora Archipelago. He also participated in the Marine Cup Tournament and got to the final round against Ash. His participation in the tournament was meant to be an alibi but Cilan was able to get enough evidence to prove he was the mastermind behind the heist.

character.name: Vanipeti (Tide)
character.description: Tide`s Vanillite participated in the first few rounds of the Marine Cup Tournament. During the final of the tournament, Tide sent it to steal the Lepardas` Eye jewel from Ms Ripple room. It was able to steal it but Cilan was able to figure out that it was the one that stole the jewel as the the shape of the frozen key it used to open the case fell on the floor and left a stain.

character.name: Dentula (Tide)
character.description: Tide`s Galvantula participated in the final round of the Marine Cup Tournament against Pikachu. The two of them clashed their Thunderbolt and it knocked out the power on the ship. After a brief delay, Pikachu knocked out Tide`s Galvantula to give Ash the tournament victory.

character.name: Current
character.description: Current is a member of the International Police who was on the ship that Ash and his friends were traveling on while in the Decolora Archipelago.

character.name: Gardie (Current)
character.description: Current`s Growlithe was briefly seen in the episode jumping into the air and taking out Tide`s Vanillite which in turn also took out Tide.

character.name: Quattro
character.description: Quattro is Pokémon Trainer who entered his Futachimaru into the Scallsword King Playoffs tournament on Hotachi Island.

character.name: Futachimaru (Quattro)
character.description: Quattro`s Dewott participated in the Scallsword King Playoffs tournament on Hotachi Island. It lost to Ash`s Oshawott in the final round of the tournament. Realizing that she wouldn`t be with Quattro`s Dewott, Mijuka jumped off the stage to be with him. This caused Ash`s Oshawott Scallsword to break and according to the rules of the tournament, it was stripped of the title of king and Quattro`s Dewott became the king.

character.name: Mijuka
character.description: Mijuka was introduced by Freddy to the crowd of the Scallsword King Playoff`s on Scallsword Island as the winner of the girls` competition and was designated the Queen for a year. Ash`s Oshawott instantly fell in love and gave her a bunch of red roses which she dismissed away. Undeterred, Ash`s Oshawott competed in the playoff and ended up winning the competition. Realizing that she wouldn`t be with Quattro`s Dewott, Mijuka jumped off the stage to be with him. This caused Ash`s Oshawott Scallsword to break and according to the rules of the tournament, it was stripped of the title of king and Quattro`s Dewott became the king.

character.name: Pansy
character.description: Alexa is a journalist who works at a publishing house in Lumiose City. She is Viola`s elder sister who is the Santalune City Gym Leader.

character.name: Gogoat (Pansy)
character.description: Alexa`s Gogoat travels with Alexa on her journey`s. It stays outside of its Pokeball as it carries her belongings. It knows which pack has which items better than Alexa does.

character.name: Erikiteru (Pansy)
character.description: Alexa`s Helioptile was the first 6th generation Pokémon to appear in the anime series.

character.name: Lotus
character.description: Lotus is Holly`s mother.

character.name: Cacto
character.description: Cacto is Holly`s father. Cacto is Portugese for cactus.

character.name: Yukiya
character.description: Yukiya is a Pokémon trainer that participated in the Pokémon Sumo which was part of the festival on Harvest Island that celebrates the harvest of fruit. He knocked over Ash while getting the fruit pie that Ash was going to eat. Yukiya was quite rude to Ash at the time and told him it was first come, first serve. Cilan and Iris calmed Ash down though before the argument escalated any further and Yukiya walked away. During the Pokémon Sumo, he was first matched up against Meowth who was dressed up in a Golonya costume. The match only lasted one move which sent Team Rocket flying into the sky. Yukiya made it to the finals where he was matched up against Ash. He thought he could easily defeat Ash`s Pignite, but its agile moves proved to be too much for Golurk and Ash defeated Yukiya to win the Pokémon Sumo. Alexa had told Ash and his friends about an old legend on Harvest Island where there was plenty of fruit and the people lived prosperously. But eventually, everyone wanted to eat even more delicious fruit and to claim them as their own that it led to fights breaking out. The forest gradually got ruined due to the war and there were no more fruit to pick any more. Before long, two powerful Pokémon fought for the last fruit. The two Pokémon fought harshly, but ran out of strength before the fight could be decided. Just then, a boy from the village ran up to them and gave them pieces of fruit, saying, "It`s more tasty if you share it with others". And so, the forest returned to its former state and continued to produce delicious fruit. The prize for winning the Pokémon Sumo was a bunch of fruit which Ash shared to the people at the festival. He then shared a fruit with Yukiya to try to mend the argument and rivalry they previously had.

character.name: Golugh (Yukiya)
character.description: Yukiya`s Golurk participated in the that participated in the Pokémon Sumo which was part of the festival on Harvest Island that celebrates the harvest of fruit. Since no Pokémon attacks could be used in the tournament, its sheer size gave it an enormous advantage. During the Pokémon Sumo, Yukiya`s Golurk was first matched up against Meowth who was dressed up in a Golonya costume. The match only lasted one move which sent Team Rocket flying into the sky. Yukiya`s Golurk made it to the finals where it was matched up against Ash`s Pignite. Yukiya thought he could easily defeat Ash`s Pignite, but its agile moves proved to be too much for Yukiya`s Golurk and Ash defeated Yukiya to win the Pokémon Sumo. Since Pokémon attacks were banned from the competition, none of Yukiya`s Golurk moves are confirmed.

character.name: Mondo
character.description: Mondo is a Pokémon trainer that participated in the Pokémon Sumo which was part of the festival on Harvest Island that celebrates the harvest of fruit. He maybe a relative of Dr. Claw as he doesn`t like the audience seeing his face. In the first round of the tournament, he was matched up against Iris. He ended up defeating her as Iris` Dragonite tail touched the field before throwing Tunbear. He was later eliminated in a round that was not shown.

character.name: Tunbear (Mondo)
character.description: Mondo`s Beartic participated in the Pokémon Sumo which was part of the festival on Harvest Island that celebrates the harvest of fruit. In the first round of the tournament, it was matched up against Iris` Dragonite. It ended up defeating Iris` Dragonite as its tail touched the field before throwing Tunbear. Mondo`s Beartic was later eliminated in a round that was not shown. Since Pokémon attacks were banned from the competition, none of Mondo`s Beartic moves are confirmed.

character.name: Kairyu (Ibuki)
character.description: Clair`s Dragonite is the evolved form of Clair`s Dragonair. It was sleeping in meadow when Iris` Dragonite was sent to find it. Iris` Dragonite crushed a flower in the meadow near Clair`s Dragonite and Clair`s Dragonite got mad at it for doing so. The two of them fought from that point on.

character.name: Anima
character.description: Anima`s name was revealed in the closed captions of the Japanese original airing as her name wasn`t said in any actual dialog in the episode. She mysteriously appears to Ash and his friends just after Alexa explained the legend of the hero Woodate. She asked if they were heading to the summit of the mountain and after they confirmed they were, she gave Ash a medal. She later reappeared to tell them that what they were seeing was the Ghost Pokémon`s comet dance. The Ghost Pokémon danced like that to give praise to Hero Woodate. Alexa had recorded the whole incident but it ended up to be blank. Later, they reviewed the book to see the girl they had met the night before was standing beside Woodate who was holding that same medal.

character.name: Onvern (Pansy)
character.description: Alexa`s Noivern was revealed when it was sent out to protect her from a bunch of Ghost Pokémon.

character.name: Woodate
character.description: In ancient times, a peaceful island in the Decolora Archipelago was suddenly attacked by a group of Pokémon. A man named Woodate arrived on the island from across the ocean. To save the people who were exhausted from the Pokémon`s assaults, Woodate skillfully led the Pokémon to the summit of the mountain. And then, when he held up his hand to the night sky upon his arrival at the summit, A comet emitting dazzling light appeared, illuminating the earth. It was as if Woodate had predicted the appearance of the comet; the Pokémon became rooted to the spot, calmed their rage and submitted to him. And so, peace returned to the island. Afterwards, Woodate remained on the island with the Pokémon and Trainers who heard of him gathered from all regions to challenge him. On the battlefield built on the summit of the mountain, Woodate displayed excellent battles and didn`t lose even once, it`s said. The people of the island called him a hero and called the comet that appears every 10-odd years the "Woodate Comet" to praise his achievements.

character.name: Tony no Okaasan
character.description: Tony`s Mother was talking to Officer Jenny when Ash and his friends arrived on the scene. Tony`s Mother was upset because her son Tony was missing. Officer Jenny said there had been reports that a Pokémon uncommon in the area was walking with a boy looking like Tony on its back. Tony`s Mother explained that he might have gone to the observatory as her husband works there and it`s his birthday. She continued by saying Tony was excited to celebrate it with him and even prepared a present but her husband had to stay overnight at the observatory and couldn`t come home. Officer Jenny instructed Tony`s Mother to stay at home incase he returned there.

character.name: Tony
character.description: Tony is a young boy that lives with his parents on an island in the Decolora archipelago. While walking near the Pokémon Center, he met Alexa`s Gogoat and he touched its horns. Alexa`s Gogoat is able to sense the strong feelings of those who touch its horns. Sensing that Tony wanted to visit his father, Alexa`s Gogoat motioned for Tony to ride on it so they could go to the mountain observatory where his father worked. Tony`s Mother was upset because her son Tony was missing. Officer Jenny (Isshu) said there had been reports that a Pokémon uncommon in the area was walking with a boy looking like Tony on its back. Tony`s Mother explained that he might have gone to the observatory as her husband works there and it`s his birthday. She continued by saying Tony was excited to celebrate it with him and even prepared a present but her husband had to stay overnight at the observatory and couldn`t come home. Officer Jenny instructed Tony`s Mother to stay at home in case he returned there. Thankfully with the help of Ash and his friends, they were able to find Tony and make sure he got to his father despite being told it was a dangerous journey to come visit him on his own.

character.name: Tony no Chichioya
character.description: Tony`s Father lives with his wife and his son Tony on an island in the Decolora archipelago. He works in the mountains at an observatory. His wife was upset because her son Tony was missing. Officer Jenny said there had been reports that a Pokémon uncommon in the area was walking with a boy looking like Tony on its back. Tony`s Mother explained that he might have gone to the observatory as her husband works there and it`s his birthday. She continued by saying Tony was excited to celebrate it with him and even prepared a present but her husband had to stay overnight at the observatory and couldn`t come home. Officer Jenny instructed Tony`s Mother to stay at home in case he returned there. Upon safely arriving at the mountain observatory, thanks to Ash and his friends, Tony`s Father was glad to see his son but told him that was very reckless of him to try to come to visit him on his own.

character.name: Drago
character.description: Morana is a trainer that traveled to the Isshu region from the Sinnoh region to close down the Sanyo Gym. She takes pleasure in humiliating gym leaders by forcing them to battle with her and accept unreasonable offers to shut down their gyms. She challenged Chili and Cress and defeated them both but they didn`t close down the gym as they told her about their brother Cilan who was also a gym leader. She tracked down Cilan and challenged him also. Cilan`s marriage with his Yanappu proved to be a powerful combination and they defeated Morana to nullify her attempt to close down the gym. She vowed that the next time she met Cilan, she would make sure that she defeated him.

character.name: Yukinooh (Drago)
character.description: Morana`s Abomasnow was first seen stirring up trouble when Cilan`s Pansage tried to share some fruit with it but threw a punch at it instead. Morana said that it was punishment for approaching her Yukinooh so carelessly but Cilan`s Pansage was trying to be kind and wanted to share. Yukinooh`s Ability is Snow Warning but despite the type disadvantage, Cilan`s Pansage`s sense of unity with Cilan proved to be the deciding factor in the match. Morana`s Abomasnow lost the match against Cilan`s Pansage but Morana vowed that the next time they met, she`d make sure to win.

character.name: Manmoo (Drago)
character.description: Morana`s Mamoswine battled against Chili`s Pansear in a match that would close the Striaton Gym if Chili lost. The type advantage that Chili`s Pansear over Morana`s Mamoswine proved ineffective as Morana`s Mamoswine countered that disadvantage with power. Morana`s Mamoswine won the match.

character.name: Onigohri (Drago)
character.description: Morana`s Glalie battled against Cress`s Panpour in a match that would close the Striaton Gym if Cress lost. This was the second match as Chili`s Pansear had already lost. Cress`s Panpour didn`t prove to be that good against Morana`s Glalie as it was quickly defeated.

character.name: Crimgan (Ibuki)
character.description: Clair`s Druddigon was first revealed in the Japanese opening Summery Slope (夏めく坂道). It is an alternate colored Crimgan.

character.name: Fukamaru (Iris)
character.description: Iris captured this Pokémon in Blackthorn City while she was there to challenge Clair to a battle and saw chewing up the city and causing mischief. Iris` Gible marks the third Dragon type Iris has caught.
